block.p: WINKLER-John, 91, of Rossmoor, Monroe Twp., NJ, passed away Sunday at home. Formerly of Brooklyn and Manhattan. Beloved by his wife of 59 years, Marjorie Mills Winkler; his daughter Nancy Winkler Naftulin; his son-in-law, Lawrence Jeffrey Naftulin; and his granddaughter, Julia McLeod Naftulin. Private interment at Greenwood Cemetery. Memorial Service will be held on Friday, June 16, 2000 noon at the Rossmoor Meeting House, Monroe Twp., NJ

WINKLER-John, 91, of Rossmoor, Monroe Twp., NJ, passed away Sunday at home. Formerly of Brooklyn and Manhattan. Beloved by his wife of 59 years, Marjorie Mills Winkler; his daughter Nancy Winkler Naftulin; his son-in-law, Lawrence Jeffrey Naftulin; and his granddaughter, Julia McLeod Naftulin. Private interment at Greenwood Cemetery. Memorial Service will be held on Friday, June 16, 2000 noon at the Rossmoor Meeting House, Monroe Twp., NJ
